CustomField.formula: IF(WEEKDAY(Delivery_Start_Date__c)=1, 'SUN', IF(WEEKDAY(Delivery_Start_Date__c)=2, 'MON', IF(WEEKDAY(Delivery_Start_Date__c)=3, 'TUE', IF(WEEKDAY(Delivery_Start_Date__c)=4, 'WED', IF(WEEKDAY(Delivery_Start_Date__c)=5, 'THU', IF(WEEKDAY(Delivery_Start_Date__c)=6, 'FRI', IF(WEEKDAY(Delivery_Start_Date__c)=7, 'SAT','')))))))
CustomField.label: Delivery Start Weekday
